name: Laser Defender (Nebula Studios)
description:
Objective:

A space shooter game where you have two objectives; don't die, and don't let the enemies cross the border to your galaxy! If you fail one of the objectives, the game is over.

Controls:

Move: W, A, S, D or arrow keys

Shoot: space key or left click

Tips:

Ways to lose health: Asteroid hits you, enemy shoots you, enemy bumps into you

Ways to gain health: Touch a green asteroid

-Asteroids can damage enemies as well, but the green ones can't heal them

-All asteroids are 70% more likely to spawn near the bottom (your default position)

-Green asteroids only spawn 20% of the time

-Green asteroids randomly give back 10-50 health
